channel.title: Pentax MX on Grainy Photos
channel.description: Recent content in Pentax MX on Grainy Photos

item.title: Wildflowers in Andalucia
item.description: Andalucia, Spain, boasts a diverse range of wildflowers and this year, the flowers have been exceptional because of the rain several weeks ago. See fifteen colour film photos of wildflowers in Andalucia…

item.title: Harman Phoenix 200 film - roll 3
item.description: All 36 photos from my third roll of Harman Phoenix 200 film, shot mostly on the coast near Motril. I think these are my best Phoenix 200 photos so far.

item.title: Harman Phoenix 200 film – roll 2
item.description: Harman Phoenix 200 is a new colour C41 negative film, full of character and a unique look. See all 36 photos from my second roll of this interesting film.

item.title: Pentax MX
item.description: The Pentax MX was a 35 mm SLR camera manufactured by Asahi Optical Co. between 1976 and 1985. A fully mechanical and well-built camera, highly valued to this day.

item.title: Harman Phoenix 200 colour film – first impressions
item.description: My first impressions of the Harman Phoenix 200 colour film, a brand-new ISO 200, C41 colour experimental film with high contrast, strong visible grain and loads of character.
